title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, the selection does not get registered for the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item in the outline view.

Observed Behavior: When trying to select an item, the focus immediately jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Expected Behavior: The selected item should remain highlighted and the focus should not unexpectedly shift to the library file node.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select an item in the outline view.
